item.title: How to use Polymer
FAQ
item.description: Polygeist builds successfully but won’t run tests Double check that Polygeist’s build can find lit, LLVM’s testing framework. This can be done by explicitly passing lit as an argument to CMake as described here . Other If you have an issue not resolved here, please make an issue on Github and consider making a pull request to this FAQ!
